players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is dead. This is terrible. We need to figure out who did this. I'm just a villager, so I don't have any special abilities, but I'll be paying close attention to what everyone says."
Diana: "I know who the mafioso is. Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out to stay safe."
Bob: "Diana, accusing me so quickly without evidence looks suspicious. Why would you target me on Day 1? Maybe you're trying to divert attention from yourself."
Bob: "Diana, your quick accusation without proof is exactly the kind of move a mafioso would make to sow distrust. Alice, what do you think about this sudden claim?"

Diana: "I understand Bob's attempt to deflect, but I investigated him last night and found out he is the mafioso. Alice, can you confirm you're a villager? We need to unite and vote Bob out before he kills again."

You: "Diana claims Bob is the mafioso and that she investigated him. Bob is accusing Diana of deflecting. As a villager, I don't have any information. We need more discussion to understand who is telling the truth."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
